```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
mydata <- read.csv("1-1.csv")
plot(mydata$Height,mydata$Weight, xlab = "Height / cm", ylab = "Weight / g", pch = 19, las = 1)
mydata.lm1 <- lm(Weight ~ Height, data = mydata)
abline(mydata.lm1)
```

```{r}
ggplot(mydata, aes(x = Height, y = Weight)) + geom_point(shape=19) 	+ stat_smooth(method = lm, level = 0.95) + xlab("Height / cm") + ylab("Weight / g") 
```
